articles.author: Karin Valentine
articles.title: 'Lakes' under Mars' south pole: A muddy picture? - Phys.org
articles.description: Two research teams, using data from the European Space Agency's Mars Express orbiter, have recently published results suggesting that what were thought to be subsurface lakes on Mars may not really be lakes at all.
